equation:
\begin{equation} \label{rbtz}
ds^2 = - {(r^2- r_+^2)(r^2-r_-^2) \over r^2} dt^2 + {r^2 dr^2 \over
  (r^2 - r_+^2)(r^2 - r_-^2)} + r^2 \left( -{r_+ r_- \over r^2} dt +
  d\bar \phi \right)^2.
\

\begin{equation} \label{rbtzb}
ds^2 = - {(r^2- r_+^2)(r^2-r_-^2) \over r^2} dt^2 + {r^2 dr^2 \over
  (r^2 - r_+^2)(r^2 - r_-^2)} + r^2 \left[ {r_- \over r_+ r^2} (r^2 -
  r_+^2) dt + d \phi \right]^2,
\

\begin{equation} \label{erbtzb}
ds^2 = {(r^2- r_+^2)(r^2+ \tilde r_-^2) \over r^2} d\tau^2 + {r^2 dr^2
  \over (r^2 - r_+^2)(r^2 + \tilde r_-^2)} + r^2 \left[ -{\tilde r_-
  \over r_+ r^2} (r^2 - r_+^2) d\tau + d \phi \right]^2.
\

\begin{equation} \label{lsing}
\Delta t = {r_+ r_- \over (r_+^2 - r_-^2)}\Delta \phi_n \pm {r_+ \over
(r_+^2 - r_-^2)} \cosh^{-1} \left[ \sqrt{ \alpha \over \alpha-1} \cosh
r_+ \Delta \phi_n \right] + {2\pi r_+ \over (r_+^2 - r_-^2)} i m,
\

\begin{equation}
\Delta t = { r_+ r_- \pm r_+^2 \over r_+^2 - r_-^2} \Delta \phi_n +
{2\pi r_+ \over r_+^2 - r_-^2} i m.
\

\begin{equation}
\Delta t = \pm \Delta \bar \phi_n + {2\pi r_+ \over (r_+^2 \pm r_+
r_-)} i m,
\

\begin{equation} \label{pdisc}
ds^2 = {4 \over (1-\bar X^2 - \bar Y^2)^2} \left[ d\bar Y^2 +
    d\bar X^2 + {r_+^2 \over 4} (1+\bar X^2 + \bar Y^2)^2 d\bar
    \phi^2 \right],
\

\begin{equation}
T_1 = {1+\bar X^2+\bar Y^2 \over 1-\bar X^2-\bar Y^2} \cosh r_+
\bar \phi,
\

\begin{equation}
X_1 = {1+\bar X^2+\bar Y^2 \over 1-\bar X^2-\bar Y^2} \sinh r_+
\bar\phi,
\

\begin{equation}
X_2 = {2\bar X \over 1-\bar X^2-\bar Y^2}, \quad X_3 = {2\bar Y
  \over 1-\bar X^2-\bar Y^2}.
\

\begin{equation}
K_E(x,b') = {(1-\bar X^2 - \bar Y^2)^{2h_+} \over [2\bar X \bar X'
    + 2 \bar Y \bar Y' - (1 + \bar X^2 + \bar Y^2) \cosh^2
    r_+ \Delta \bar \phi ]^{2h_+}}.
\

\begin{equation}
T^2 \cosh r_+ \Delta \phi_n - 2 \eta T \sinh (\beta - r_- \Delta \phi_n)
- (1 + X^2) \cosh r_+ \Delta \phi_n +2 \eta X \cosh(\beta - r_- \Delta
\phi_n) =0.
\

\begin{equation}
T = { -i\eta \sin(\tilde \beta - \tilde r_- \Delta \phi_n) \pm [( \cos
    (\tilde \beta - \tilde r_- \Delta \phi_n) - \eta X \cosh r_+
    \Delta \phi_n)^2 + \sinh^2 r_+ \Delta \phi_n]^{1/2} \over \cosh
  r_+ \Delta \phi_n},
\
